response.response:
-------------BEGIN REPORT----------------
There is 1 bug(s) in the program:
- Bug 1, [Explanation: In the file CWE80_XSS__CWE182_Servlet_connect_tcp_74.java, the value of data at line 55 is data read using an outbound tcp connection, returned by readLine(), which is determined by the input data from the socket. The value of data is then propagated to the sink function CWE80_XSS__CWE182_Servlet_connect_tcp_74b_hooSink at line 140, where it is printed without proper sanitization. Hence, there is a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) bug at line 146.], [Trace: (Line 55, is_sensitive(data)), (Line 140, is_sensitive(data))]
---------------END REPORT----------------
